Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
